entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Trail
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:46 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.9°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Local amount 5 cm except 10 cm over higher terrain. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
